name: Aphrodite

description: You start with 40 M€ and 10 steel. AS YOUR FIRST ACTION, PLACE A COMMUNITY [PLAYER MARKER] ON A NON-RESERVED AREA.

description: You start with 40 M€. As your first action, put an additional Colony Tile of your choice into play

name: Pharmacy Union
description: megacredits (You start with 54 M€. Draw a Science card.) megacredits Effect: When ANY microbe tag is played, add a disease here and lose 4 M€ or as much as possible. When you play a science tag, remove a disease here and gain 1 TR OR if there are no diseases here, you MAY put this card face down in your EVENTS PILE to gain 3 TR. corp-box-effect

description: You start with 47 M€. As your first action, place a greenery tile and raise the oxygen 1 step.

name: Spire
description: megacredits You start with 50 M€. As your first action, draw 4 cards, then discard 3 cards from your hand. Effect: When you play a card with at least 2 tags. including this, add 1 science resource here. Standard Project megacredits Effect: When you pay for a standard project, science resources here may be used as 2 M€ each.
